overview: Six young and adventurous newcomers strip down and bare it all for their very first nude photo sessions. Loaded with cock stroking, steamy poses and revealing talk, erotic magazine photographer Brad Posey has captured it all live on video and in remarkable still photos. Intimate, unscripted and unrehearsed.
tagline: Join erotic magazine photographer Brad Posey as he captures six exclusive young models on video and in remarkable still photos. Completely intimate and unscripted.
title: Hot Sessions 1
